name: Erin Shae
text: The best of the best!

name: Sonja Lauderdale
text: Classic sauces!

name: Caitlin
text: Husband picked up Pink Pig on his meal break, we have been dying to try it months. We both got large BBQ loaded fries and split some fried pickles. The fried pickles are AWESOME and the ranch is definitely homemade, it is the best ranch I think I’ve ever had (and I’m really picky). The BBQ on the loaded fries was insanely good but the size of the large fry itself was very small, two orders would make more of a full meal. It was $19 for all of it, the amazing pickles made up for the lack of size of the fries. Do yourself a favor, you haven’t lived until you’ve eaten here!!! 🤪

resp.text: Thank you Caitlin. If you will tell me who you are  on your next visit I will make up the loaded fry. We appreciate the review and gladyou enjoyed.

name: Michael Kemp
text: This Barbecue is the closest I've felt to Texas since I moved here. It's amazing.  The food is so good that it's hard to explain it.  I highly recommend them

name: Karea Wise
text: Love the loaded fries. They are always hot and fresh and yummy.

name: Allen Fowler
text: Shawn and Anita do an outstanding job. The barbeque is great and is only surpassed by the whole catfish. Best catfish in North Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you we appreciate you!

name: erika elrod
text: This place is awesome and the people are more amazing then food, which is top notch!! Shawn and Anita rock!

name: Crystal Harvey
text: Absolutely love their food! Everything is amazing and I would recommend them to anyone looking for amazing bbq and great service! Definitely worthy of the drive to whatever location they may be at that day!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate your business!!

name: Julia Hale
text: Wonderful smoked bologna sandwiches!

resp.text: Thank you Julia. We appreciate your business and Support!

name: Kesha Dutton
text:
The pink pig is the absolute B E S T!! My favorites are: stuffed potatoes, loaded nachos and fish plate! Definitely ask for a cornbread fritter too!!!
They not only have awesome food, but they also support the local football team as a meal sponsor!

resp.text: Thank you we appreciate you and your business and always glad to support the team!

name: Lana Terry
text: Best food... love everything on the menu and like the way they set up at different locations to make it convenient for everyone!!! 🥰

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Tori Letson
text: The best barbecue around! They are always updating their menu keeping things interesting and have the best customer service! My food is perfect every time and tastes delicious! I LOVE the Pink Pig!

name: Kayla Hamilton
text: Sweetest people and the best food! My favorite BBQ & That sweet tea is 🙌🏼🙌🏼

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Nick Hatton
text: Great food and company! best meatloaf i've ever had!

resp.text: Nick rhank you for your business and support we appreciate it.

name: Jamie England
text: Best bbq in town! Smoked meatloaf is great! Piggy fries are fantastic!

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Aletha “LC Auction Action” Flanagan
text: Best barbecue around! The nachos are to die for! And you can’t beat the fast and friendly service!

resp.text: Thank you we appreciate you and your business!

name: Ashlyn Brannon
text: Foods always a 10/10 and the people are always so nice, best bbq around !

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: patsy borden
text: BBQ Nachos are so good but so far everything we have tried is delicious!!! One of our favorite places to eat!!!!

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Mike Howell
text: Nice people,  good bbq

name: Amanda Coyle
text:
AMAZING Food and Friendly staff
The Nachos are my FAVORITE!!!!!

name: Charlie Webster
text: Awesome food with very friendly employees

name: Jake Burkett
text: Love the barbecue and the people! Food is top notch and service is great, you can’t beat the Pink Pig!

name: Bronnie Grissom
text: Some of the best bbq I have ever ate

resp.text: Thank you Sir!!

name: Crystal Yarbrough
text: Great food and Great people! Love the nachos!!!

resp.text: Thank you we appreciate you and your business!

name: kristen owens
text: Great food and great service!!

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Beth Love
text: I love their stuffed nachos. They are some of the sweetest people you will meet  . They stay busy bc the food is scrumptious ! Worth the wait !!

resp.text: Thank you Beth! We appreciate you, your business and support!

name: Kelly Mcelwaney
text: Absolutely delicious! Best BBQ in the Tennessee Valley hands down! The owners and workers are great and so appreciative of all thier customers! Once you eat at The Pink Pig you will become a repeat customer! I wish I could give them 6 stars!

resp.text: Thank you Kelly we appreciate you and your business!!

name: scott devaney
text: Great BBQ and great service. Always fresh and cooked to order.

resp.text: Thanks Scott we appreciate your business and hope to continue to serve you in the future.

name: Anita Linderman
text: They did the food for my daughters wedding & everyone just raved about how good the food was. Great people to work with & great prices too.

resp.text: Thank you Anita! It was great  working  with you and we appreciate your business and support!

name: Johnboy Sanford
text: Great wood fire 🔥 cooked food every menu item is delicious and a great price very nice folks

resp.text: Thanks John we appreciate the review and your business!!

name: Anita Linderman
text: They did the food for my daughters wedding & everyone just raved about how good the food was. Great people to work with & great prices too.

resp.text: Thank you Anita! It was great  working  with you and we appreciate your business and support!

name: Kristy Beckman
text: Omg so good. I drove from Somerville to Moulton just for their nachos. I need to try the other menu items but lord help me those nachos are the best I've ever had. Just amazing.

resp.text: Kristy thank you so much! We truly appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future!! Thats a long drive but we are glad you made the trip. Look for us at Riverfest Sept. 14th and 15th!

name: Brandi Standridge
text: Just ate at Pink Pig for the first time today.  Boy are you missing out if you don’t try it. We had a stuffed potato and bbq nachos. They were both excellent!!! We will definitely be back!!!

resp.text: Thanks Brandi we appreciate your business and support!

name: tonietta love
text: This is one of the best spots to eat in Moulton. The food is always good and fresh. The steak sandwhich happens to be my favorite! Shawn and Anita are so down to earth, and they let us know that they appreciate our business. If you haven't tried it...you better!!!😋

resp.text: Thank you Tonietta we appreciate your business and support!

name: Brittany Bryant
text: Delicious😊

name: jackalyn contreras
text: Good food

name: Kristan Mills
text:
Wow! Nachos so good make you wanna call yo momma. Add vinegar slaw to your nachos. It compliments the dish.
The chips were crispy and fresh.
Topped off with tangy white bbq sauce and delicious red bbq sauce. Also, the perfect amount of pulled pork mixed in. 👌
Best southern hospitality in Alabama✔️
I will definitely be coming back. I drove 50 mins to get here and every mile was worth it. Plus, the girl scouts stopped by and we bought some cookies. ♥️

resp.text: Thank you Kristan! We enjoyed talking with you guys. We are proud that 50 minute drive was wirth it. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Joshua Hall
text: Excellent food! Friendly service!

resp.text: Thanks Joshua we appreciate your business and support!!

name: Brandon Lucas
text: The food was absolutely delicious

resp.text: Brandon Thank you! We appreciate you and your business! We hope to serve you again in the future!

name: Johnathon Horton
text: Amazing food and super great people

resp.text: Thanks Johnathon we appreciate your business and support!

name: Sal Jasso
text: Great food!

name: Lillie Luker
text: Wonderful!!
